title: How do i set up a mic? Windows 8
body:
Hi,

So recently I wanted to set up a mic on my windows 8 PC, but I can't do it for some reason, so I have a headset and the mic is built into the headset and it only has 1 jack and when I ask my friends how many jacks they have they said they have 2 jacks, so I'm a bit confused. Can anyone help? Thanks{{champion:266}}

replies.body:
Hey Smilebigger, 

You might need an audio jack splitter if your computer only has one jack. Some devices only need one jack for both input and output audio, so that might be what your computer has.
